name: Herbed White Bean Chard Bowl with Pepita Parmesan
description: This Herbed White Bean Chard bowl is full of amazing flavors from fresh herbs. Thyme pepita parmesan adds the crunchy cheesy topping. Vegan Gluten-free Clean eating
recipeIngredient: 4-5  large Rainbow chard leaves (chopped, fat ribs removed.)
1 can Great Northern beans  (or other white beans)
1/4 tsp each of dry thyme (rosemary, garlic powder)
lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil
1 Tbsp bread crumbs (or gf crumbs or oats or pepitas)
a generous dash of black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat at medium heat. Add the garlic powder, cayenne and salt and cook for a few seconds to infuse the oil (or use water/broth).
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat at medium heat. Add the garlic powder, cayenne and salt and cook for a few seconds to infuse the oil (or use water/broth).

recipeInstructions.text: Add Chard leaves and 1 Tbsp of water, mix well. cover and cook until lightly wilted 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Chard leaves and 1 Tbsp of water, mix well. cover and cook until lightly wilted 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove Chard from the pan and add to bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove Chard from the pan and add to bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add beans, salt, a Tbsp water and herbs to the same pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Add beans, salt, a Tbsp water and herbs to the same pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and Cook for 5-6 minutes. Let sit covered for 2 mins then Remove from pan and add to bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and Cook for 5-6 minutes. Let sit covered for 2 mins then Remove from pan and add to bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice juicy tomatoes or cherry tomatoes and add to bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice juicy tomatoes or cherry tomatoes and add to bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a drizzle of lemon juice and optional extra virgin olive oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a drizzle of lemon juice and optional extra virgin olive oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Grind or blend the pepitas, breadcrumbs with the herbs and nutritional yeast to a coarse mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind or blend the pepitas, breadcrumbs with the herbs and nutritional yeast to a coarse mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle liberally on the bowl and serve warm or cold.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle liberally on the bowl and serve warm or cold.
